name: Respiración
text: Breathe in slowly. Let your fingers flow naturally across the keys. There is no rush, only the gentle rhythm of your typing.

name: Momento Presente
text: In this moment, focus only on the present keystroke. Each letter is a meditation, each word a peaceful journey.

name: Maestría
text: The path to mastery is not measured in speed, but in mindful practice. Type with intention and awareness.

name: Fluidez
text: Like water flowing over stones, let your fingers move smoothly and effortlessly. Embrace the calm of focused practice.

name: Paciencia
text: In the garden of learning, patience is the soil from which skill grows. Type gently, type mindfully.

name: Aprendizaje
text: Every mistake is an opportunity to learn. Every correct keystroke is a celebration. Find peace in the process.

name: Silencio
text: The quieter you become, the more you can hear. Listen to the rhythm of your typing, feel the flow of your thoughts.

name: El Viaje
text: There is no destination, only the journey. Enjoy each moment of practice without judgment or pressure.
